DECISION MAKER & INFLUENCER MAPS

From understanding CIO's in complex multi-nationals, to exploring the content and channel preferences of data scientists, Unrival enables marketeers to plan and execute results-driven ABM that is powered by data.

Marketing
MARKETING SOLUTIONS

Actionable data-led insights enable Marketers to drive ABM strategy.

B2B marketers are facing a continually challenging landscape. Whether its targeting the right accounts and individuals, segmenting the right demographics or aligning with Sales teams, Unrival supports Marketing with actionable data-led insights that enable Marketeers to drive their ABM strategy.

EXECUTIVE SOLUTIONS

Data driven decisions to align sales and marketing.

Build your ABM programme with data driven decisions that enable you to align the sales and marketing teams for effective, joined up activation. We will help you target key executives in prospect accounts and make your communications relevant to the individual.

Trust
TRUST & COMPLIANCE

Unrival respects personal data and is fully GDPR compliant.

We process only data related to the professional attributes and interests of individuals. We only process data in-line with what our clients ask us to do, and inline with best practice for profiling and handling of sensitive data.
